alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Madison (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 1:50AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Madison and southeastern Carroll Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 149 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles southwest of Hobbs State Park to 3 miles east of Kingston. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Huntsville... Green Forest... Withrow Springs State Park... Carrollton... Rudd... Kingston... Marble... Forum... Osage... Rule... Clifty... Rockhouse... Dryfork... Cabanal... Metalton... Connor... Alabam... Delmar... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
